name: BlazeBot
description: What is the project about? BlazeBot is a telegram trading bot on the Base blockchain, releasing tools to the public that were previously only available to highly experienced developers. What makes your project unique? Limit buy/sell, copy trade successful wallets, snipe new launches and anti rug tools to help protect you in DeFi are the initial suite of tools offered through custom wallets which can be encrypted. Whatâ€™s next for your project? BlazeBot will release a Dapp version of the telegram bot in the near future. What can your token be used for? Holders of the BLAZE token receive 70% of all revenue generated paid out on a weekly basis.
